Text: WTF?! Why in god's name would you make it one big file?! Lazy bastard!!!
I agree. I'm thankful for the album, but why, oh why, is it ripped as one big file?
some1 knows where i can find the CUE file?? thanks
You can get an xmcd sheet from freedb.org and convert it to a cue with this: http://xmcd2cue.sourceforge.net/
